General.Name: Goldgroup Mining Inc.
General.Description: Goldgroup Mining Inc., together with its subsidiaries, focuses on the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold-bearing mineral properties in Mexico and the Americas. It holds a 100% interest in the Cerro Prieto project located in the state of Sonora; and the San José de Gracia project situated in Sinaloa State, Mexico. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1166 Alberni Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3Z3

0.Name: Mr. Anthony Bob Balic
